title: TeamViewer security advisory (AV26-090)
description: On February 5, 2026, TeamViewer released a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: TeamViewer Full Client (Windows)  versions prior to 15.74.5
TeamViewer Full Client (macOS)  versions prior to 15.74.5
TeamViewer Full Client (Linux)  versions prior to 15.74.5
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
